FuncDef: The display sr-te policy binding-sid allocation command displays information about the SR-MPLS TE Policy to which a binding SID in the specified SRLB range is allocated, such as the endpoint and color information about the SR-MPLS TE Policy.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the binding SID value in SRLB range.
The value is an integer ranging from 48000 to 1048575.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If an alarm is generated indicating a binding SID allocation failure, you can run the display sr-te policy binding-sid allocation command to check which SR-MPLS TE Policy occupies the conflicting binding SID.
